description: This file sets up routing for an Express.js backend, importing various route modules and defining endpoints for health checks, authentication, courses, lessons, media, AI, users, activity, notifications, course requests, recommendations, progress, and enrollments. It also includes a nested route for listing lessons by course.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines the health check GET endpoint at '/'

methods.name: router.use
methods.description: Mounts sub-routers for various API paths such as '/auth', '/courses', '/lessons', etc.
